vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.12;
son of: Ammishaddai (H5996)
§ Ahiezer = "my brother is help"
1) a Danite chief who assisted Moses
2) a Danite chief, one of David's heroes
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Amisadai; jefe; tribu de Dan; en tiempos de Moisés; (b)   hombre; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞希以謝 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟是幫助"
1) 一位協助摩西的但族首領
2) 一位但族首領, 大衛的勇士之一 (代上 12:3)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚希以谢 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟是帮助"
1) 一位协助摩西的但族首领
2) 一位但族首领, 大卫的勇士之一 (代上 12:3)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.12.3;
son of: Shemaah (H8094);
brother of: Joash (H3101L)
§ Ahiezer = "my brother is help"
1) a Danite chief who assisted Moses
2) a Danite chief, one of David's heroes
